author: Special Correspondent
text: Power supply will be disrupted at the following areas coming under the Sub-station at Peelamedu from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. on February 4: Bharathi Colony, Ellango Nagar, Burani Colony, Shoba Nagar, Ganapathy Industrial Estate, Police Quarters, Krishnarajapuram, Athipalayam Pirivu, Rama Krishnapuram, Avarampalayam, Ganesh Nagar, V.G.Rao Nagar, P.S.G., Estate, P.S.G Hospital, Kamadhenu Nagar, Nehru Street, Anna Nagar, Arumugam layout, Thiruvalluvar Nagar.
title: Power shut down on Thursday
